channel.title: HD Sprite Hovering
channel.description:
I've been wanting to be able to use HD sprites for sprite hovering on interfaces for a while now. I have the original button(s) using HD sprites, it's just that I haven't been able to figure out how to make the sprite that shows whenever you hover your mouse over it be HD as well. I've looked into RSInterface.java and it uses a method in client.java.
RSInterface: [code]tab.type = 0;[/code]
My class9_1.type == 0 code just refers to the buildInterfaceMenu method.
And here's my buildInterfaceMenu method: http://pastebin.com/kThezrLn
If anyone could give me hints on what to look for in my buildInterfaceMenu method, I'd very much appreciate it.
And yes, my client can support HD sprites; I use them for almost everything on my client (minus sprite hovering). So no one ask that question.
